introduction:
Assuming you have R installed and running, run the following scripts before attempting the questions below:
install.packages(c('tidyverse','data.table','pacman'))
require('tidyverse','data.table')

labs.prompt: Which of the following will give us the current directory of this R instance? Select only 1.
Which of the following scripts will give us a character vector of all file names in the 'C:/Home' directory? Select only 1.
Which of the following scripts will read the 'DSA_Order_data'csv file in folder 'C:/Users/bntwok200/Box Sync/iComp Transaction Data/Work Files/Text Files'? Select all that are correct
answers: a. read.csv('C:/Users/bntwok200/Box Sync/iComp Transaction Data/Work Files/Text Files/DSA_Order_data.csv', stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
b. readr::read_csv('C:/Users/bntwok200/Box Sync/iComp Transaction Data/Work Files/Text Files/DSA_Order_data.csv')
c. read.csv('C:/Users/bntwok200/Box Sync/iComp Transaction Data/Work Files/Text Files/DSA_Order_data.csv', stringsAsFactors=TRUE)
d. data.table::fread('C:/Users/bntwok200/Box Sync/iComp Transaction Data/Work Files/Text Files/DSA_Order_data.csv')
